issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

seen on ipod touch 4.0.1 - 4.2.1 [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/24/11 08:14 e1cb22a)

when setting app badge "IMLocalObject died" seen in console
1.Phone > app badge
2.Tap "set app badge" then backgroudn the app and check for the badge
3.back to app, tap reset and check for badge, also check console.

results:
Thu Jan 27 11:25:08 unknown sandboxd[1903] : KitchenSink(1891) deny iokit-open RootDomainUserClient
Thu Jan 27 11:25:08 unknown KitchenSink[1891] : [Warning] IMLocalObject died: [IMLocalObject] Port Name: com.appcelerator.pushtest-listener

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: when setting app badge "IMLocalObject died" seen in console

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed.
